author: michael-pitt
body:
#### PR description:

New filter to select events with a fixed number of forward protons, to be used with Pythia/Madgraph or any other event generator w/o cut on forward proton kinematics in central exclusive production processes (pp -> p + X + p )

The code can be used in generator fragment in the following way:

```
HepMCFilter = cms.PSet(
  filterName = cms.string('TaggedProtonHepMCFilter'),
  filterParameters = cms.PSet(
    xiMin = cms.double(0.02),
    xiMax = cms.double(0.2),
    nProtons = cms.int32(2),
  )
),
```


#### PR validation:

The code was validated with `CMSSW_10_6_30_patch1`, and the following output is obtained from the generated samples:

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/25157357/202125741-6f1056df-3bcb-4622-aef3-ef13e54587c8.png)

#### If this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR. If this PR will be backported please specify to which release cycle the backport is meant for:

Besides the standard release, please backport the code to 12_3, 12_4, 12_5, and 10_6_X
title: Add TaggedProton filter for analysis with tagged protons
